charleston.neighborhoods: Historic Downtown, West Ashley, Mount Pleasant, North Charleston, James Island
charleston.meetingHighlights: Historic port-city fellowship with many downtown and beachfront meetings, plus frequent speaker events and newcomer-friendly groups.
charleston.transitInfo: CARTA buses serve the Charleston metro; Charleston International Airport (CHS) for regional flights.

columbia.neighborhoods: Downtown, The Vista, Shandon, Forest Acres
columbia.meetingHighlights: State-capital meetings with a mix of university-linked and neighborhood groups; active weekday attendance.
columbia.transitInfo: The COMET provides local transit; Columbia Metropolitan Airport serves regional flights.

greenville.neighborhoods: Downtown, West End, North Main, Augusta Road
greenville.meetingHighlights: Active downtown and suburban meetings with regular speaker nights and strong newcomer outreach.
greenville.transitInfo: Greenlink buses serve the city; Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport (GSP) for regional flights.

myrtle-beach.neighborhoods: Downtown, Myrtle Beach Boardwalk, Market Common
myrtle-beach.meetingHighlights: Coastal tourist-area meetings with seasonal attendance peaks and steady local groups year-round.
myrtle-beach.transitInfo: Coast RTA and local shuttles provide transit; Myrtle Beach International Airport for regional flights.

spartanburg.meetingHighlights: Neighborhood and downtown meetings with steady attendance and active service groups.
spartanburg.transitInfo: SPARTA buses provide local transit; regional highways connect to Greenville and Charlotte markets.
